item.title: Needle Threading: Can LLMs Follow Threads through Near-Million-Scale Haystacks?
item.description: Can LLMs effectively handle information spread across vast, almost million-scale datasets? This research investigates this question by evaluating 17 LLMs on novel ‘needle threading’ tasks. These task…
